jd: From: Krish, CodersAmerica krish@codersamerica.com Reply to: krish@codersamerica.com Hi, Hope you are doing great!!please send me an updated copy of your resume and below details.Only GC and USC candidatesPosition:Pega DeveloperLocation:Washington DC/RemoteDuration:Long term Job Description: Experience of 10+ years Proven work experience as a Pega developer.• Advanced knowledge of Pega PRPC 7.x/8.x.• Familiarity with J2EE, XML, Java, JSP, and EJB.• Familiarity with Scrum and Agile methodology.• Knowledge of web technologies including JavaScript, CSS, HTML5, and XML.• Advanced knowledge of Pega Class Hierarchy, experience with Java and .NET based applications, and should be able to manage day to day tasks as a project team member while supporting the team.• Excellent task management skills.• Ability to troubleshoot complex software issues• Meeting with business analysts to discuss the pega specific requirements.• Designing and developing Pega BPM applications.• Performing solution architecture within the Pega PRPC environment.• Designing class structures, application frameworks, and data models.• Coordinating with the project team to ensure the business architecture matches the needs of the project and program.• Integrating web services.• Troubleshooting application issues, coding bugs, and bottlenecks.• Conducting system performance tests. * Good communication and interpersonal skills. If you are interested in this job position mentioned please respond with your resume in MS word format with these details. Full Name:Current Location:Contact No (Cell Number):Email ID:Skype id:Linkedin id:Visa Status:Availability:Currently on Project (Y/N):Open to relocate:Last 4 digits of SSN:Passport No:Total Exp:US Exp:Rate: Thanks & Regards,KrishKumar,Senior IT RecruiterCodersAmericaKrish@CodersAmerica.com
